titleStmt.title: Certaine select prayers gathered out of S. Augustine's meditations which he calleth his selfe talke with God.
De meditatione. English.
titleStmt.author: Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Probably not in fact by Augustine.
At foot of title: Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
"Saint Austens manuell, or litle booke of the contemplation of Christe" has separate dated title page (leaf N1); register is continuous.
The British Library copy identified as STC 925 on UMI microfilm reel 237.
Reproduction of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
Appears at reel 484 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 237 (British Library copy).
